title: Meeting of minds: the mentor program
creator_credit: Ivan Gaal and Victoria. Ministry of Education

video_links.name: Meeting of minds: the mentor program

brief_description: This program explores four mentor-student relationships. Each relationship is unique and serves to demonstrate the versatility of the mentor concept. The students are shown in their home and school environment. Administrative processes involved in the mentor program are also illustrated.
